I imagine if you show up at night you need to be prepared for a totally different scene that is less focused on the food and more on finding something to soak up all that margarita by the yard or random neon colored alcohol beverage.  I may visit at night just to see what the spectacle looks (and also 24 hours, relatively quick is better than almost every other option out there)

CUmk-_i4UoA8lBq3ma9UlA.text: Came here last night and I must say that i was really impressed.  I got  a large burger, and it didn't disappoint.  Good size and tasty.  They need to put one in San Jose instead of all that crappy in n out.

WfwXVhBqfGSAIGQ83Rd_4g.text: A great place to grab a good burger and fries at 2 in the morning. One time my husband picked out some songs to play on the jukebox but he didn't  put the right numbers in.  So Michael Bolton was blasted through the restauraunt at 2 am.  I don't understand why anyone would have Michael Bolton in the jukebox anyway????

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fatburger with cheese

06dCLk8tWHNzIRAKyXT0xQ.text: Well here we go, my first 1 star review in Yelp!  The biggest reason is because it took them 30 freaking minutes to cook a freaking Baby Fat burger. Yep, a fast food restaurant actually beating a fine dining restaurant when it comes to serving! And no, it was not as if they were crowded. There were, believe it or not, just 4, FOUR people on the line. The poor guy in front of me had to wait 15 minutes just to be served up his soda. Oh man, it was so sad I almost laugh. And those clueless idiots (Pardon me) keep asking our orders for probably 5-6 times throughout the 30-minute torture.  The burger itself isn't that great, and is overpriced like hell. It was overcooked, dry and not juicy at all. And I finished a $3.50 burger with just 3-4 bites. Wew.  Just go to In-N-Out. I've not been to their outlet in Vegas but it would take something extraordinary to be worse than these guys.

RinbV5z77AsKJstYw7Guyw.text: Better than standard burger fare, but no In-and-Out.  That said, 10 STARS for the milk shakes. AMAZING! We couldn't get enough!   Jukebox is fun.

TcGfSwruVe6niqE-aFI_Dw.text: Concept is great, liked the value, burgers were cooked to well done. Maybe it's a Midwest thing but we'll done! I know medium rare isn't always an option but health code can be met long before the meat is dry and crunchy. Not sure if it's policy or an individual cook...won't go back to find out.

fVQ5TnufYFGaH5kCmetbHw.text: I love fatburger!!  Went here a couple of time during our 2 week holiday in Vegas and couldn't fault it.  Being a veggie I obviously had the veggie burger, so tasty! Boyfriend had the XL burger on his first visit with egg - it was huge! He couldn't finish it and he's had a 1lb burger and a 1/3lb burger in one sitting once in fuddruckers with no problem. But fatburger defeated him! Chips/fries are great and the oreo milkshake. Only thing is they asked me first time if I wanted whipped cream on top to which I said no, but did't get asked second time. Didn't think anything of it unitl it arrived with a load of cream on top. yikes, not a fan of cream!   I'm just gutted we couldn't find it on our first night! I had read it was behind the MGM, which it really isn't! So went off in the direction of Hooters looking for it (obviously wrong way!). Being hungry in a new city, which was unbelievably hot is not a good combo when all you've read about for months before going away is fatburger and other similar  burger joints and you just don't want the usual mcdonalds.  If only we had one in the UK!

z1M-EAOUT9YFyiC8KEwxIA.text: Burgers were HUGE, but so was the price .. kind of cool to check it out once, but there are so many better options in Vegas, I probably won't bother again ..

TAv2jFdl8nvcT4edY-ELCw.text: I love this place!  Great "after the club" eats.  The place is open 24 hours.  I ate there two nights in a row.  First night I had the turkeyburger.  Very  juicy, the best turkeyburger I've ever had.  I had to wait a little bit, but it was so worth it.  The second night, I had the baby fat burger with fat fries (steak fries). So good!   Because it's open 24 hours and most people do go there after the clubs you do get some sloppy loud drunks in there.  If you get irritated by those folks, just get it to go!

WtKok_3kcJdo_x6caQREWw.text: Open 24 hours great! But because of its location it seemed like everyone in Vegas was hungry at the same time so the wait for food was long then once I ordered it was about a half hr until my number was called. So service was bad.  Cleanliness was not taught to any of the employees there and the bathroom was hideous and smelled horrible.  Only positive was how delicious the food was despite the high prices.

uYOmFCnCrUlgD3Sk49OwcA.text: Great burgers and atmosphere. Enjoyed sitting outside  on the strip to eat. They also had all of the football games on the tv's. Would go back for sure.

KgjF-FUwwYunYhPFBWrwOg.text: Fatburger is great not the best, but a great place to hang out and eat. There burgers are very good and there fries is absolutely great.

7lbHyY4f_9z83PKHCbPTeQ.text: Ate here once and that will probably be enough. There wasn't necessarily anything wrong with the burger, but at this price, you are pushing into "gourmet" burger territory and gourmet this ain't.  Frankly this a step up in price from the Five Guys and In-N- Outs of the world and a noticeable step down in quality. As such, I can't say I really see a reason to eat here.

S4lpiX-MBoJPyruj7MkNtw.text: Had this during my last day in Vegas.  It was the best hungover meal ever! I had the medium burger and the onion rings.  The bad part about this place, the wait is kinda long and the workers yell really loud.  Not really cool when you've partied too hard the night before and you just want to enjoy your meal in peace. haha

xonkojBt8JQKouNAKoYRDQ.text: Worst service ever. I and 4 of my friends went there to watch the game for our week trip to vegas and when we got there we were excited because they had our game on a picturea of enjoying a nice burger was dancing through our heads....Unfortunately as soon as we sat down the fat non paying barback changed the game so that he could watch his chicago bears play. With a look of disbelief at how he could so blatantly ruin our experience I kindly asked the bartender if he could change it back he said no he couldn't because it was on a revolving channel to which I responded we just sat there an watched your barback change it. After not getting any kind of help I an my friends got up an left. I know our bill would have easily been over 60 bucks a mere drop in the bucket for such a franchise but in the end fatburger has lost 5 paying customers for a lifetime . We ended up back at the time share with some Chinese food .

MTm22ZRNFcL6wMX4-GKuyQ.text: Food/quality: Great juicy burgers with tiny fries. It is fast food, but definitely a great deal especially late at night in Vegas after having some drinks during the evening.   Service: Service here is what I had a problem with. When I ordered for my boyfriend and myself, I had to repeat the order several times to the man at the register. He seemed to have trouble understanding our orders. For example, when stating that I wanted everything except tomatoes on my hamburger, he placed the order with tomatoes only. After continuously trying to have our order input correctly, I still had to walk up to the people preparing the food to have the order changed to what we wanted.  Atmosphere: Interesting crowd. I remember there being a drunk girl falling all over the place in line. The bathroom here was not worth using, so I waited until heading back to our hotel.  Value: Inexpensive quick meal, especially after you have already had a huge dinner elsewhere earlier in the evening followed by drinks.

kUn03tzZG0zHOvctlqREMw.text: This place was busy! when we came in. Thats usually a good thing, and the line seemed to move pretty quickly. I was entertained with them yelling out the orders as well :) It doesn't take much to entertain me.    We got our food and I have to say that my favorite part was the fries. They were excellent. The burger its self almost reminded me of a chicago style hot dog because of what was on it. Good, but not amazing.  It was fun to eat in here and just watch all the different people come and go.

MkOr8uIBTfA6SkSVEwRvXg.text: I was dying to try this place. My man and I made it our first food stop in Vegas, and I'd have to say it was just ok. It reminded me of Wendy's, but with a longer wait time and a seedier crowd. I didn't want to put my purse on the dirty floor for fear of theft, so I kept it in my lap. All this did was make me look like I was afraid, and you never want to show fear. I put it on the table.  Other posters have commented that the best bet is In-N-Out, but I also think their burgers taste like Wendy's.   My man really wants to eat here again when we return to Vegas at the end of the month, but I'm going to drag him to BLT Burger.

JtZ5a76QUfC3UNNJnC7ifQ.text: Delicious!  Might put a small dent in your wallet, but if your in las Vegas your not going to mind too much!  Ask for cheese!

Qmzbh6eU3eJ8yrSKoWYzwg.text: One of my first stops every time I'm in Vegas.   It's one of my favorite burgers anywhere and the chain hasn't made it to my corner of the world yet.   Since my last visit - they have expanded to add the "Fat Bar" - which provides the same great food in a patio bar out front of the restaurant.  The only thing better than a Fat Burger is washing it down with a nice beer.   After a little taste testing - I've decided I like the skinny fries better than the fat (wedge) fries.  See you next time Fatburger!

KGPBZb3laIYtTtK7nd2vKw.text: Wow i finally tried the famouse fat burger. And dam was it good. So so dam good. Makes a fat boy smile kinda good. Had the large with cheese and an egg. I was blown away with the great combo. I love this place.

vQCrkpQKBYO-6_z8B5jHRQ.text: I love the bay area, but it's missing my favorite burger stand, maybe the last great hamburger stand,  Fatburger.   I love fatbuger the way ed m loves arby's.  When lovie yancy opened the first fatburger she wanted to share the gift of a double king burger topped with cheddar cheese, bacon, grilled onions and a fried egg with all of los angeles.  Thanks to the beauty of expansion that dream extends as far afield as vegas baby...vegas.  I gotta say there is no better hangover deal on the strip than the aforementioned double king paired with fries insouciantly smothered in chili cheese and onions.    My one gripe about this place is that they don't make the shakes fresh so they tend to be a little more solid than I'd like, but hey at least they're real icecream

SJdw2uILMjD806Moyggnlw.text: Yummy, the burgers are good, the fries are good, the soda is good...  The employees are nice and you won't pay the price of a $20 room service burger, that's for sure.  Affordable and tasty...also, the location is pretty much tops.

IOzb0BJJ1wEdtH91iuL1og.text: AMAZING!  Quick service for fresh food!  I had the baby fat and it was MORE than filling.  Loved it!  Had the onion rings.  Loved them too!    Go there.  It is quick, cheaper, and 24 hours!  I wish they had on in Chicago!

jCpwd0RVQIyPl7Fdfqjh1w.text: I wish I could give this more props but... I really wasn't all that impressed. The hamburger was dry.  But... I love the name of the place. Love the jukebox.... and love the late night hours.

xCOqRKSFBkv4SF-W2rxPNA.text: First off, I didn't love the food here.. but....   We were visited at 3 am and when we walked in they started blaring Biggie Smalls so loud. Everyone in line started dancing and singing. Even the fry cook was raising the roof. My friend was dancing like crazy. For the whole time we were there they only played Biggie and Tupac. So awesome/strange.   Also at Fat Burger, some guy who said he was from the south side of Chicago gave me his CD. He said his friend was from WI and I said I was too. When he asked where I told him and he shouted out to 920, our area code up there.  The whole end of that night was super bizarro. There is video that exists somewhere and I must find it!

wR3STfM-rYo7kSP1dqqKdw.text: Pretty good burger, and there are lots of condiments to it.  The only thing was, I wanted to add cheese and an egg, but that would mean that I would have to spit out an extra $1.98... almost another babyfat burger.... I wish they could have made those additions a tad cheaper.  Fat fries are YUM :D

3I-w5T7ufrv3MmhLeXpevQ.text: long lines, made sloppily, take forever, bad service, however the drunken crowds that fill this place along with the never changing satisfying taste make this place a four star

JrdLXu_KOLgWDE378AwvEA.text: Great atmosphere. Servers aee friendly and wuick. Go during the early afternoon for the best service. Drinks are huge fyi! Love this place.

tIv8pF-h2wQbxVIsPY2FiA.text: Always a burger favorite! Good juicy burgers with all the favorite trimmings!! Oreo cookie shakes are a favorite as well! Soooooo much better than In n Out!

yHeLV3y8f9OlRd3LoX2z3Q.text: Okay place. Nothing extravagant. It is expensive  for burgers though. 2 medium burgers with cheese, skinny fries, and onion rings = $17.88.   Come to try if you need a quick bite.  Cooked well, onion rings rocked, burgers were burgers.  Great alternative to In and Out Burger as well, and way less busy!

khSgvC-3g52sjPqSWXty7g.text: Great burgers, super delicious, the burgers are made fresh so they take a while to make, but well worth the wait. And they are 24hrs.

6sgj55uchagAUaUJ6QMTKw.text: Great when you're out and about at 3am and weaving in between the hookers that roam the streets late at night.

FS00xkFxb0k0XiosNlchbA.text: So when we came the first time the service was great , today was horrible thanks to a slow rude Jackie. First she overlooked us for about 20 minutes then took our drink order and came back another 20 minutes later. Food another 30 later and of course NO FRIES. someone ran the fried out after we were done and waiting for the bill. She never checked back! I had enough time to site and take my time writing this review, and I'm still waiting for this Jerk.

zqRYumatSTRQkwwXNF8LEA.text: Great for a cheap burger fries and beer.  Friendly quick staff. Check for a groupon deals. Large outdoor area with lots of flat screen TVs.

iwWF4WcZtdcMC38IbzIxOA.text: Shared triple burger with my wife and had perfect people watching over the strip!  Great experience!

liYkWiq3Nor4C0yYDD1uXw.text: It was cool....expensive because it was on the strip...I was still on from the bottle service we had that night (we went to fatburger at 3am) so my review isn't 100% clear hahahaha. But anyway, it was cool food, got the smallest burger and it was literally small lol!   I'll be back, when I'm sober :)

loO-YP0FE2YhHNSG3UgYxw.text: I really enjoyed the burger joint. The sandwich was great and to be honest leaves you wanting more. I enjoyed my experience.

4l6SXa8RJqsYzgZLDCgoPw.text: What's wonderful about a 24hr Fat Burger? Well if were like me and craved a juicy burger at 5am, this is a dream come True. I get here and I am met with fellow breakfast burger aficionados. I got myself a XXL with cheese, bacon, egg, and avocado. Sitting outside on the Vegas strip at 5am enjoying a well-made burger is pretty amazing.... It's American!

51OgtztU-5W4wza2QfF-Ww.text: As much as I plan to have a nice steak dinner or something of that sort when I visit Las Vegas, just being real, there is no time! I'd rather spend my days at the pool or shopping and nights at any hip hop night club dancing til the morning hours. With that being said I do not want to put my party dress on and sit down for a large dinner before I go out all night. I went to Vegas for six days and ate here 3 times. The last time was before I headed to the airport so I can have one last taste. There's no better way to drink heavily other than to eat here. The skinny fries are great as well as the onion rings. The burgers are by far the best. Fresh, tasty meat with great toppings. I wish there was one close to me! Love this spot

LNHuPZc1Zs4epHrP_zFsmQ.text: Fat-burger is the best burger you can ever taste in your whole life. I say that because its so dam True . once you try the xxxx burger it will literally put you on your back . the meat is thick with very nice and tasty flavors and once you take a big bite of the burger you can taste the freshness of the bun, to the lettuce to the tomatoes and onions and the melted cheese . don't forget about the speechless chill cheese fries  and the great one and only milkshake is to die for. if you never been to fat burgers your missing out so much. Its truly a must to go their . you truly need to go if your a big time hamburger eater . its truly a big time must for-real. Don't miss out on the greatest hamburger you'll ever eat in your entire life.

qtVKbNv_80aa3kDDmtLoow.text: This is only my second yelp review. I only write them when I have a very noteworthy experience so believe me when I say this was one of the worst restaurants I've ever been to. To keep it simple Ill just bullet point my experience below.    1.Walked in for breakfast. Saw an employee sitting at a booth eating McDonald's breakfast.  See four other employees standing doing nothing.   2.Looked at menu and ordered breakfast burrito and side of ham steak, listed on menu for 3 dollars.    3.Told they don't carry ham steak.    4.Change it to bacon. Ask about what the "bread basket" for 10dollars is.  Told they only have English muffins now. The rest didn't sell we'll.    5.Finish order and choose to eat outside. Proceed to walk past the employee sitting at the bar drinking beer and watching basketball.    6.Wait for 20 minutes for my breakfast burrito.    7.Look around at the restaurant where no food is being delivered during the 20 minutes.   8.Begin to breathe smoke as employee drinking beer at bar decides to light up cigarette.    9.Wait 15 more minutes for food, only being asked how I'm doing once.    10.Get food, which was fine. Just ok.    11.Watch another employee behind bar texting her BFF or something. Had to get up and ask for silverware. Was pointed to where I could get it myself.    12.Finished food, getting asked by what looked like the janitor (he had been cleaning the metal around the bar, sweeping, etc.) how my meal was. Was tempted to leave him the tip instead.    13.Walked out without tipping and wrote yelp review, then wrote fat burger Vegas off my list.    I suggest you skip steps 1-12 above and start right at step 13.

iUgEdmR_HQgwCe3rxSODEg.text: They're open 24 hours for a reason: it's the best burger on the Strip morning, noon, and night.   Fresh burger patties, fresh toppings, and great service. Every time I'm in Vegas, I make sure to get me a Fat Burger! :D

Q67L3QgYPYz8isvd7n3OkQ.text: Food was good, bartender fantastic, waitresses horrible. It was a great day so we decided to eat outdoors. We were told to sit at any table and a waitress would be with us shortly. Ten minutes later, after making eye contact and waving at 2 waitresses, we still had no menus. We decided to sit at the bar. Best decision every. The bartender, receipt said Lyman, took our order right away and got our drinks to us in no time. When the kitchen forgot one of our burgers he went to the kitchen and brought out the burger. The drinks were very potent. He really saved our lunch.

TdN-xZw5sIvF97ohKs5ruA.text: Worst experience! We sat and ate here. The service was ok but their chicken sandwich was absolutely terrible. I'm not a fan of McDonalds but their dollar menu sandwich is probably better than this $7 something piece of tasteless food. Never going back.

jjV-tNeAenXA95ffPaipcg.text: For vegas, really great price on food. Great service, they are pretty nice for seeing tourists all day, and man...my burger was awesome. I remember thinking it was one of the best and cheapest (ratio wise) burgers I have ever had.

J8baaFjH8UOt0lOy62B2kA.text: I really liked this indoor-outdoor burger and booze place.  The burgers and fries are better than the much hyped Shake Shack across the street.

4Gladl6D6z5amJFMtELRng.text: we just left fatburger downtown Vegas. Very bad service. Didn't even ask how we were doing or checked on how was our food or drink. I was almost choking on my burger cus I didn't have anything to drink.  Negative 5 stars

XzPwcio9LOoXdZVXeod8bA.text: I ordered a chicken burger, onion rings, and a drink. Talking about freakin good.! Probably one of the best burgers I've ever had. I loved that it wasn't oily or greasy. The onion rings batter is thin and flakey but trust me it's good.!! Highly recommend

pSB26h6Ac-vgx72VNTE5AQ.text: This is my favorite Burger 'joint' in Vegas. I prefer it over In-and-Out, I havent tried GR's BRGR yet but plan on it next week! Fatburger is one of those places that just tastes great along with their fried. This year when we went, they added a FATBAR which has an outdoro bar, outdoor seating and table service instead of the inside, where you place your order after waiting in line and what not. the inside portion still exists but the outside is a very nice new add on. Love the burgers and love the 24 hours! try to eat there 2-3 times in my 5 day stays!

OlruC5WYlexuHfGJKpRS1A.text: Wow - first time at fatburger and it was awesome!!!!  You can add pretty much anything you want to your burger, I had mayo, fried onions, cheese, pickles and lettuce and it hit the spot.  We had chili cheese fries that were about what you'd expect , pretty good but nothing special.  Long wait for the food (20 min) but it was worth the wait.  Central location on the strip, near MGM , across the street from the Monte Carlo.  I just wish they had these in MN!

ZGuQ_EvBN9UcHnBn91CrPA.text: Can you say delicious!? Service was good. Food was amazing.  Loved the atmosphere ! Who doesn't ? It's Vegas!!!!!

_RFIIMeDcyuG-9_4zXXtzw.text: I tried the 1/3 or 1/4 lb Fatburger and I must say that I was impressed! The burger was fresh and tasty! I've never had relish on a burger so I was ready to dig in, the relish complemented the sandwich perfectly! I would recommend for people to give this joint a try if you are in the Las Vegas area!

iXTbnlNNYXxFYon0WzDYRw.text: Love the burgers here.  So flavorful and juicy.  The one lb burgers is plenty to split between two people

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. One lb burger with grilled onions and the works.  Plenty for two

kTKi4dxGvMUdqw_KzhgayA.text: I was actually really excited about this place when I came here for the first time. Then, when I tried their burgers, I wasn't impressed, I've had much better elsewhere for the same price as Fat Burger. It was good to try once anyway...The only way I will get this next time, is with Groupon probably..maybe even not.   Its way to too crowded, again not worth. Also, the chairs outside, not comfortable. I like how they have a bar outside though. Not sure what they sell there, as I didn't order any alcoholic drinks, but still cool they have a bar outside. Fat Burger is also 24hrs, which is convenient. I think I'll come here next time when I'm way too drunk, not just to eat. LOL

IVJeppz90nEPX_B4_X4O9A.text: Excellent service as usual from Duwan tonight!! Nice clean place.. the food and service is great!

UNADlNtl2w5p9lQy7FiPvw.text: Good quality burger. The fat fries were good. My wife loved her cookies and cream shake. But they keep the bathrooms locked which is a big negative in my book and I think they let the p - traps dry out cause in crush spots near for drains you could smell sweet gas....yuck.

UNq6gJa-29ujvfSM6xjMHg.text: What a joke, guys on the street giving 2 for 1 coupons. You go inside, order a well drink which then costs you $13! Come on... What kind of scam is this. I'm used to expensive drinks on the strip, but this is over the top.

IgCKXkzTVD9XtNGBfysrlA.text: I'm a total fan of Fatburger. IMHO, it is a superior burger to In-n-Out. Yeah, I said that. And their chilli cheese fries are pretty great too.  This location is on the Strip, near the Hawaiian Marketplace. You'll pretty need to park elsewhere and walk here. There's an inside area and an outside area. Since people-watching on the Strip is a fav pastime of my mine, we opted for outside.  The outside space is a circular bar with bar seating and then several high-tops. It's a seat yourself place. Unlike other Fatburger locations, this one has waitresses. So when you sit outside, a server will come and take your order, bring you your food, and bring you a check.  Also unlike other Fatburger locations, since this one has a bar, you can get beer and mixed drinks. There's also a slushie stand where you can purchase those crazy yard-long tourist concoctions.  The service isn't much, but that's kinda to be expected.  The food, though, is awesome. I thoroughly devoured my delicious burger and all the chilli cheese fries. If you're looking for a good, cheap-ish burger, and want to partake in some excellent people-watching, this is the spot for you.

Y5-iSRjmdDEwEaPndeLxRg.text: If you love a good burger, not dry at all, with a soft bun and real juicy beef, then you will love fat burger, its a most eat if your a burger lover now if you think mc donalds is better then wendys then dont go to fat burger your taste in food is way off most people like Comercial burger spots but i scout a good burger wherever i go so to sum this one up,   go during the day to avoid the night time drunks and make sure you grab a Guinness on tap and enjoy a DOUBLE 1POUND XL BURGER WITH CHEESE.

u7Cj1FZkTMBuglS80OzVdg.text: I love this place because I'm always drunk when I'm here, the chili cheese dogs are da bomb and gin n tonics are 2 for 1! Yeah Vegas!

ciW1IuDfKBikZArO2yla0Q.text: Living in the Midwest we do not have Fatburger but they use to sell that patties at Walmart which my family liked. Coming to Vegas I decided to give it a try and have to say I was sorely disappointed. Order a large which by the menu would lead me to believe it was 2 beef patties but it was only one and really the flavor was poor. The fries were not very good either. The saving grace was the milkshake, very good and the only reason I bumped to 2star instead of one. Will not repeat.

yiVN-UL7KGZ30eTr0cnE5w.text: First time down here...used a Groupon for yards! $13 refills! Ordered me a 1lb cheeseburger and the girl at the counter was super friendly... the music is decent and people watching is excellent!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LISzsNeMwHHhDM1acoc32A.text: On our last night in Vegas we decided to opt for a burger joint. We opted to eat outside and even though there were other customers smoking it was not a problem at all (we are both ex smokers). Ordered our food and shakes without any problems. When the shakes arrived they were thick and creamy just like they should be and the taste was really nice. The burgers arrived and they were thick tasty and juicy and cooked to perfection. We had ordered one portion of the thick fries and one of the thin fries. The thin fries were a little cold but this cannot be helped. The food tasted great and we both left feeling full and not over stuffed. If we visit Vegas again we will deffo use this burger joint again.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8cQCQN-_Sk1D7MWD06Ujug.text: Waited at our table for 20 minutes, no service, said excuse me to one waitress and she ignored me. 3 groups that showed up after us got immediate service. Absolutely atrocious.

P72c8N8t1btz2_Ndiyx7Kw.text: Taste like every burger. Nice employees, though the seating inside is a bit small. Prices are decent.

PXzTnpJd4NtYJAf6ALaMRA.text: We stopped by for dinner after seeing the Blue Man Group. Since it was the 4th of July the Vegas Strip was crowded. Neither of us were in mood for a fancy sit-down place and most of the fast food places had long line. On the way to see the fireworks at Caesars Palace, we saw this place and there were plenty of places to sit outside so we decided to eat here.   I had a veggie burger and my husband had a burger with a single patty. I thought it was fine as I expected to be. Since it was too hot to eat a lot of food, we didn't order anything to go with the burger. I thought the portion was just right.  Service was fine.

rRElIOVFGLaCn4SH17a4qw.text: Ready for some food this am. Gonna be a good burger. It was so good we went two days in a row for breakfast. Had hamburger and fries one day and eggs bacon and potatoes the next day. And it was reasonable prices. Would recommend this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vnsibOcHn6ZwJEhgU3in9w.text: So I've never been here before and it was conveniently right next to my hotel. I decided to stop here for a burger and see what the fuss was about and wowee it was a nice experience :) Our waitress, Lexi greeted us and was super friendly as if she was our friend for years! I ordered the crispy chicken burger, it was so crispy and moist! It wasn't a plain ol soggy burger from Mickey D's so it was a nice change. Lexi, our waitress would come by frequently to make sure everything was going well with the food and everything. All in all I would love to come back to Las Vegas and eat here again. There's no possible way to compare it with the Harley Davidson Cafe (which was mediocre at best)  down the street.. ::shudders::  Go FatBurger you ROCK ;)

JtIAoINP7ixzzYBL7JN4rQ.text: Damn! That burger was good! Seasoned to perfection to. Quick and easy order, and they will bring you the food. I was full but I kept eating til it was gone. The price was about $7.50 for my burger not sure how much my lemonade was.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chili cheese fat fries and a medium burger
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My order number

cy-EdYf_ZGmI4DiDpr8x0g.text: Very pricey but in my opinion a very good burger. I prefer it low carb style(no bun) & using a knife and fork. Friendly staff. Great people watching if sitting outside.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HwTx6goYL_c474m8MEtTvg.text: I was recently in Vegas for a week for business, and found myself needing to do lunch on the first day there. I have a thing about hotel food (don't), so I yelped to see what was around.  And lo and behold....RIGHT across the street from the Aria shows a Fatburger!  Hadn't eaten at one of these since I moved from LA, so off I went.  Typical setup - stand in line to order, get a #, go sit and wait.  But....the ordering....ahh.....first, a REAL burger, cooked to your specs.  Choice of size.  Choice of REAL cheese.  Choice of bacon.  Choice after choice after choice.  You know...like a REAL burger place (kinda knocks In-N-Out out of the category).   Ordered the basic burger w/swiss and bacon (I know, I know...that's so unlike me...(cough)), along with a small fries and a diet coke.  Received my meal about ten minutes later...and it was JUST like I remembered them...divine.  Definitely recommended!!

93KQx98ZRWkpNtAA1ENsQA.text: All I wanted was a big fat burger, asked a few security and different people on the stripe the best place was sent here.  I walked in saw a group of firefighters there, so that was a good sign to see the locals still eat here.  My burger was actually two patties, which was fine. They were cooked excellently. I splurged the the $2 for bacon and cheese on my burger.  It was pretty messy, but what good burger with lots of fixings isnt?  I was a little disappointed in the onion rings. They were home made there, but fell apart easily and not all that flavorful.    If you go, order a burger, stay away from the onion rings.

qbE5a0xhnhs122SqSduEIw.text: While out shopping need something to settle the alcohol that I was consuming. It has been too long since I indulged in a Fat Burger. The food here even though it is considered fast food is amazing. I am waiting for my fat burger now and enjoying a little people watching here in the lobby of the LV strip.   This location is convenient to so many restaurants in this immediate area. It is fairly busy too. The lobby is not crowded most seem to order and then enjoy their burgers on the go or at the bar. Their is a shady area for guests to enjoy their food outside. It needs a better way to keep it cool but some guests might enjoy the umbrella shade even on our 100 plus degree summer days.  The cashier was pleasant and friendly and took my order with no issues. While waiting for my food the only issue that came up was the fact that they do not have ice cold air conditioning for the guests. The skinny burger that I ordered hit the spot too. Plus it was less calories than the larger burger too!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Skinny Burger no Cheese

g44_jbjz8mVs_qXFUNN5Vw.text: This is my first time and my wife's also going here. We both got the xl burger and it was delicious. My wife got the onion rings and I got the fat fries. They were bomb. Service was quick and we got our food made fresh and quick. I highly recommend this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fatburger with fat fries

rErehw0DmEG55V3IqW2gMA.text: Went to this location for a quicker bite to eat. GF and I were greeted by a friendly waitress and told to sit anywhere. She came soon after to take out order but we weren't ready. We asked for her to return and she happily agreed. Soon after, a large man named "Brian" came over to tell is that since we were not ready to order, we needed to "go inside" to order since the waitress was "off the clock". No one told us this prior to this interaction and Brian was quite rude stating "you sent the waitress away so now you have to order inside". Due to being so rude in his delivery and not even having less than 5mins to order, we decided to go elsewhere where we were treated much better. Perhaps Fatburger doesn't care about the customers, but we dropped over $200 in food, drinks, and tips for a simple burger elsewhere on the strip.

SMO-jFRnNDgDPebs5bc12Q.text: after a night out, this place is a go-to stop. Especially when choices are limited early in the morning. Staff was friendly enough and welcoming. I ordered the xl burger with egg, bacon, and cheese. Very filling- though a little lacking in terms of flavor. I found myself reaching for the pepper and salt a couple of times. One thing im not a big fan of is the use of shredded lettuce as it causes a mess when it falls out. Overall- glad I tried it, will definitely be trying other joints tonight

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

sGuocxSuSixCXrx-8pBr-A.text: Obviously the number system doesn't work at this Fatburger because a couple that showed up after me and my friend received their food first at number 55 while we were 52.  Only one table when we showed up and we get our food after people that showed up after us, I mean it's a burger joint so shouldn't our burgers be done before those after? This location is conveniently located on Las Vegas blvd but the prices reflect the location as it's about double what a meal would be off the strip.  I always go with the big fat deal with cheese and fat fries cooked well done, they are consistent with the burger seasoning every time although they can be sometimes slow.  Very disappointed with the service at this location as all employees are looking at each other on what to do.  All in all this meal took 23 minutes to prepare and our order was bypassed

-tN4yacPQ7-VowTeWBjkRA.text: Horrible service. Skinny black girl that works the outdoor bar ignored us and wouldn't take our order. When I ordered from the (guy) at the bar and then told by the bartender (guy) to take a seat and she'll take our drinks and food to our table she completely ignored us again and left the drinks in the bar, my girlfriend had to get up and get them.  Please fire her, lazy person.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The nasty lazy girl.

jNkKX2Yf5glijEqnFroKtg.text: My favorite burger stop that I must visit every time I'm in Vegas. We don't have them in the Midwest.  I like sitting outside at the bar area. The bartenders are friendly and the burgers are delicious. I love a smash burger with relish and the rest of the fixings.   I'll be back!  A lot!

GxfiTKMCzSZujOwTgcDeLw.text: Went for a late night Impossible burger. Took 30 minutes and 6 people in the kitchen to make and get to my table. I ordered it with no mayo because I'm vegan. Half-way through I discovered mayo on my burger. I told the woman who'd brought us our food and she was apologetic. She offered to remake it. I accepted, I just wanted to leave and forget about the $50 we spent on two burgers  It was late so I got up to ask her if it could be made to go. Finally as she brought me my impossible burger with no mayo, it was open on a tray. Upon my reminder she got me a bag but at this point didn't seem to care much either way. Is everyone in Vegas drunk, including the staff??

go1JUWCozCoD-F1SbJEfyw.text: I ate here eight years ago. Although the menu has changed a bit the burgers taste exactly the same and are still just as good! When I came a few years back, my best friend loved the food so much she insisted we eat there every day. So we did. I'm glad to see the chain has expanded. They are closer to home so I'm definitely going to have to try them when I return.

1ZJeYA8sBbaHSYe6qE3lFQ.text: Love food. Great customer service. Prices are reasonable. Would definitely recommending this place. Plenty to choose from.

VAc5sLfVyKCch1Ya9Qkjnw.text: No trip to Vegas is complete without a trip to Fatburger!  There's no fast food chain that even competes with their burgers, fries, and shakes.  This trip we got the extra large burger with cheese and split it because its cheaper than ordering separate and more bang for your buck.  Of course, the burger was all the fat goodness that I wanted it to be!  The fries were on point and so was the strawberry shake!  Not only was the food great, the staff was very friendly and happy.  Fatburger will always have a special place in my heart... until next time my friend

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. inside
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hand scooped strawberry milkshake... flame!

fdNNvaeMhUSdP3HuQarKyg.text: Because it is located on the Las Vegas Strip, you are going to pay a higher price. That being said, I did not get price gouged as badly as I thought. Also Fat Burger is far better than that other brand, you know the one that has all those prepositions in its name. So if you need a quick bite, and you're on the strip, stop in. Live It Up You Are In Las Vegas For Cryin' Out Loud!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Calmer Heads Prevailed.
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hold my beer
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

y3iJTZmRiPPBEV28L1KkhQ.text: I came to Fatburger in the afternoon with a large group of very hungry friends. We were expecting a long line and lots of wait time, but to our surprise when we arrived we were some of the first in the very short line.   We all ordered various things and the nice thing about the menu is that there is a burger for every appetite! I ordered the small Fatburger, a friend ordered the large Fatburger, another friend ordered the skinny burger (no bun) and so on..   We did not have to wait long to get our food and I was satisfied with my burger. It was pretty standard, nothing out of the ordinary. I ordered it with a side of skinny fries which I really enjoyed.   All in all, I would come back

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Small Fatburger with Skinny Fries

Unif5Fj1GGtO3TiXs7JSkQ.text: One of the best burgers I have ever had. Good onion rings. All for a good Vegas style price. My server was so nice.

KIYnAsCxmXCfzCph5hWE8A.text: Fat man made for the fat burger..*sighs* this brings me back into memory lane when a location was in jersey city NJ ...my home.....as the smell of great fat burgers hit my nostril I see the nostalgia on the wall where they have the locations and where jersey city was once hanging on the wall used to be (glue marks still there)...so, I don't remember the food being that expensive but okay I get it, VEGAS lol...but man first night in Vegas the burger and fries had me full, had my girl full, we had both skinny and fat fries ..like woooosa need a treadmill after full...it was delicious as I remembered ...till we meet again my fat burgers lol

qIzMpomxYpshHTV1Bdlt9g.text: Ehh. Not really much more than a McDonald's. The burger was ok but not great. Service at the outside bar was good and they got the food out hot and pretty quickly. It was dead but they seemed to know what they were doing.  "Homemade" onion rings for $5 I would pass on. I've had better Sysco rings. Maybe the fries are better. Served its purpose for a just flew in late night fill up. They loose a star when I got the bill. I know it's the strip but $30 for a burger, beer and onion rings is too much.

cTENOWZ2ZzKQFSHnCsOlDA.text: All the hype around this place, hearing it in some rap songs and having tasted it years ago here in Vegas, I was extremely disappointed with the taste of the burgers. Shake Shack across the street is way better! Yall used to have the best messy burgers but yall fell off.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I SAID WELL DONE NOT BURNT TO A CRISP! Fries were ok.

pJ-tCEIwSgihxdawrq32HQ.text: I order the triple burger with onion rings,French and Oreo milk shake  incredible !!!!!!!!!!im so disappointed there is no Fatburger on the east coast

G2ottuBaqXNmzjN1hXKVnQ.text: The only place that is open after a late night of partying -it'll do! Great atmosphere with an old diner feeling. Ordered the original Fatburger with fries and a drink. Definitely hit the spot. Was juicy and well seasoned. Fries were also hot and not too salty. Service was friendly. No issues with finding a seat as it was quite early in the morning. This will be my go to spot whenever I will be partying late night in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Interior
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original Fatburger

r105P8nDMptOb_rqTX7k_Q.text: I love Fat burger. it's a must every time I visit the west coast. It's sooo much better than in & out I don't see the hype. Food is always fresh and fast.

Fg_bXmQr1OdrT6Wsj4odUQ.text: Average Fatburger on the Vegas Strip. The only thing I liked was the outdoor patio that looked out to the strip and the space heaters to keep us toasty during the winter months. I'm not a fan of the service though. It seemed like the waitress was bitching at all her customers and basically encouraging them to leave. I'd come back for food or drinks but hopefully on a day that service is better.

JASBCBCvfEd9TP2HZE4EIg.text: Not that great of a burger spot, maybe it was because I'm sober and most drunk ppl would say it's all that but the burger is really dry and I honestly would have just went to In and Out instead

zpg7FmhYZYnnGYDrqiXwOA.text: Welcome to the most ghetto and dangerous place in Vegas.  You walk in and all the extras that played roles in "boys in the hood" and "menace to society" are just hanging out.   I don't get how this place stays open when the white people that walk in are visibly fearing for their lives.    Oh and the place has roaches that are visibly just crawling around.    just don't do it

yCaGfuFjea5q5oFIEY8OVg.text: There is just something about being able to get a nice greasy burger and sit down between 3 prostitutes and their pimp on one side of you, and a family of 4 on the other side, and have everyone just so happy with their burger that they don't care about what else is going on. This is Fatburger!   If you like burgers, stop in and get you some!

kTof5byIseKqngG3QbLP5Q.text: I had never tried Fatburger before, but everyone told me it's one of the best places for a cheap burger and that its open 24/7 just north of the MGM. Well, I was surprised how good the food here was. I got the 1/2 pound or whatever burger, and my friend got the turkey. The turkey burger is kind of mediocre - the patty is dry and thin. Their regular burger is quite good. Very satisfying for what is a five dollar burger. I expected it to be really greasy (probably because of the name), but it was actually just a very good burger. The fat fries are also quite good. I will definitely think about this place next time I'm looking for that cheap burger in Vegas at 3am...

TtVUDKdNn__ZTVLOiXUqOg.text: Come here for the burgers!  That's it!  Just come here for the burgers.  If you can get it to-go, then even better.  I've come to Fatburger many times in previous trips to Vegas and there are 3 things that are consistent:  1- The burgers are bomb!  I always get an XL Burger which is 8oz. with everything plus bacon.  If Im really starving then I add an egg which is $0.99.  Awesome burger!  Cooked fresh and juicy.    2- This place is always dirty!  And when I say dirty, the tables are always dirty, the floors and especially the bathroom.  This time around the mensroom looked like someone threw up everywhere but in the toilet.  Gross!    3-  The cooks are lively, but the other employees who walk around doing whatever job their doing always look upset and disgruntled.    But other than that, great burgers!

KAvujcWnIaa7AkiiioAGTQ.text: We walked in and they had Tupac playing on the radio. I knew it was about to be on and poppin!  I was hopeful that Fatburger would live up to the hype and give my beloved In-And-Out burger a run for it's money. Sadly, I wasn't horribly impressed.   I went for the small cheeseburger and split and order of fries with friends. While the burger was definitely better than McDonald's or Wendy's or something, it wasn't amazingly life changing. I love the menu, the music and the overall experience of being at Fatburger, but I think I'll stick with my beloved In-And-Out.   When we walked out of Fatburger, Pac was still bumping on the speakers. Gotta love it! Nonstop Cali love!

1970qViV0t30xOtLV06SGA.text: Good place to go to after a night of partying.  Fast, yummy and perfect to eat when you don't want to feel like shit the next morning.  It's just a good and cheap alternative to the other places that vegas has.

Sx1h1mDke69AoGxADIyYZQ.text: I had their veggie burger. It was about $6 and I added cheese for $1. It was similar to Burger King's BK Veggie burger and about twice the size so I was OK with it being twice the price. Fat fries (AKA steak fries) were standard and I'm a fan of them so I liked them. My mom got a chocolate shake and that was pretty good too.   All and all I would say it lived up to it's reputation to me and the others I ate with who had regular burgers. There is limited seating so if they are really busy and you are planning to eat there you might have a problem finding a place to sit if you are in a group.

QrqCFzCGd1Xt52R5U5Yfyw.text: Worst customer service. No one at bar and,the bartender doesn't ask if we need anything. Ok if this was my business  I would fire them!

9PJ_2GFNMzVU3aH3d6aZpg.text: OK. I'll admit that in the area that I live, Five Guys is considered the best burger in the area, so when I heard all the hype about this place, I had to give it a try. I'll have to admit that this burger was definitely tasty and unlike the Five Guys burgers, did not fall apart while you are trying to eat it. The fries are almost as good, and you can have a cold adult beverage with your burger. My only negative is the construction that is going on right in front, especially, if you decide to eat outside. The dust and noise is not good. I just wish we had one in North West Florida.

ZlRTQPAQu80ErL3v_n57pg.text: Large burgers, joyous for very late nights.

rYMJ909PEysebsjs0F-_LQ.text: While the bartender was easygoing and generous with the booze, his banter was canned and generic, just like his hair. He assumed we didn't want change when we handed him a $20 for a bar tab of $11.

-rAqnLBzmXHnQZ_KahXzKw.text: I went here my first night in Vegas with my mom who had talked this place up so much before we came. I was pretty disappointed when my burger arrived and the patty was burnt and tasted like someone poured the salt and pepper shakers over it for a good two minutes. The fries were the redeeming factor for this meal since they were sooo good! The service was great too which is my reason for the second star. Maybe I ate here on a fluke night, but next time I would prefer McDonalds to this place.

yLqi2uFwCcqE3oqQJP6A6A.text: It was midnight when we arrived in Las Vegas and 3am technically for us since we came from NYC. My friend and I were starving right out from the airport as we were about to check in on our hotel we drove around to grab something quick to eat.  We ended up here in Fat Burgers and just randomly went in. I've got the fat burger medium meal as my friend tried out the turkey burger. You had a choice to add a topping for 1 dollar each however you want it. I chose cheese and a fried egg which was nice. I have to say the burgers were really juicy though not the healthiest late night meal, we were satisfied and once we got back to the hotel we were knocked out and slept well.  Great late night food!

ZJIbxxfiA0eQwiSIOaSWaw.text: It's impossible to end a night (or morning) in Vegas without stopping by Fatburger!   You can order burgers with veggie, turkey, beef, size S to XXXL.  I've seen my friends devour the XXXL and it's doable, but not recommended.  I swear they almost had heart attacks from all that meat.    Whatever you do, follow these tips:  1) Order your burger with an egg!   2) Order the skinny fries 3) Order the chili 4) Dip the skinny fries in the chili 5) Watch the drunk, cracked out patrons make fools of themselves while they dance to the jukebox music or attempt to eat their food.  Best Las Vegas entertainment outside of Cirque du Soleil or the strip clubs.  Trust.

ntrfkz9IrVqprURPlQvFZg.text: Just average I would say, a bit pricey drinks are nothing special. The burger was big and portions sizes fine.

ZSDbYPYi419yOyxmYIYeZQ.text: Maybe It was the fact that I was starving and it was 3 in the morning, but that was one of the best burgers I ever had!  Unfortunately, the dining area is disgusting (I was afraid to look at the kitchen), the staff look like they all just got out of prison and don't seem too concerned with customer satisfaction. But despite this, I would totally go back.

YsDn8Pc0tpIZBvKGuKLZbw.text: Best burger! Added patio with dj and Gogo dancers at night-the water misters outside are nice in the heat

39hnZGxXJgixSyj7skarHw.text: Okay. What do you do when you're starved for a Fatburger when last time you were in Vegas, you were rushed off with no time to get one? Come back two weeks later and find the Fatburger closest to the Airport!  This one is usually crowded but I got lucky during 11pm arrival. What makes me give them an extra star above the normal three is that the cook suggested a new way to a favorite Fatburger staples: cheddar Fat Fries. Most awesome ever. How so? The cook melted cheddar at three different levels of my fries, not creating a cap, but actually soaking my fries in the greatness that which is cheddar.   Plain medium fatburger with cheddar was perfect and my shake was great. Service was greatly appreciated.

FXwW7z86JFcJGSSopr-IVg.text: Fat burger is amazing! What isn't there to love about this place, big juicy hamburgers, fries. The location of this place is great it's on the strip and it's open all day long, do great for people getting out of the clubs and casinos. Lines can get a lil crazy it is VEGAS. Definitely a place to check out

unqyXe-cAS5JbhWOjI7XZA.text: This place was a MESS. Walked in and waited 15 minutes for my order to be taken (there was only 2 people ahead of me). Apparently they were having system issues and their computers were down so they were writing down orders and telling  the customers the bill would be brought to the tables. I ordered the original burger and a side of skinny and a side of fat fries. The food was brought to my table pretty fast. The burger was okay the fries were also okay. After the check was brought over to my table I got up and went to the register to pay and the manager standing there tells me to wait for the cashier because she's in the bathroom. So I wait. 10 minutes pass and I'm still waiting and he's still standing there trying to reboot the computers. 15 minutes pass and I'm still standing there without acknowledgement as 3 more employees are trying to reboot the computers. At 25 minutes the manager says: "so are you paying cash?" And I say "YES" and he says "Ohhhh" . So you're telling me I waited 25 long minutes standing up waiting for your system to work when allll along I could have payed cash? The least the manager could of done was apologized for wasting 25 minutes of my time but that wasn't done nor any sort of discount was applied. Talk about horrible business. Fat Burger is a Never Burger for me!

ciwzD-OdIwOZhs4AfNf9eg.text: Now THIS is a burger! The turkey burger with cheese on a gluten free bun...sheer happiness!! Please come to Dallas. They pile on the lettuce, tomatoes & etc as well. & mmm pickles! Great patio & bar area too. Keep it on your list of spots to hit up while in Vegas.

16kSETM5-M9pfOWfRGYIbA.text: I'm not sure about lunch but for breakfast definitely steer clear of breakfast at this place. Oatmeal was nothing more than a prepackaged box they hand you to make yourself. The eggs were good same for the breakfast potatoes. So if you want a simple egg and "hash" meal it's good. Just don't expect anything too exotic. IE: oatmeal.

JDilsiKhSMiGDXcBSHLTIQ.text: Everything that needs to be said has been said so I wont be long...  24hours-check... Expensive-check... Milkshakes-check... Steak fries-check...  Burgers- AVERAGE!  My cousin came here during the Mayweather-Alvarez fight and was raving about it. He told us it was a must try! Well as soon as we landed we drove here. Jet lag wouldn't allow our growling stomachs to settle for anything but a FAT burger!  I left full but underwhelmed! On top of that we shelled out over $30 for a few burgers, drinks, and fries! Sheesh! It's not bad just not the best burger I've had or anything...

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

FU1d0g7BHsUlkpOrHXuneg.text: I took the XXXL Challenge & Won! Vina was our counter person! I was starving after not eating in 24 hours! And I had a few drinks in my system. Good combination as it prepared me to meet & exceed the XXXL Challenge with bacon!  1.5 pounds of beef ... The burger was delicious..  The service was great! The fries should stay hotter longer and come out to your meal when they are at the peak of freshness! My son & I spent $45.00 including a tip. He is 10! We like to eat! That was an expensive burger meal! But Damn good!

qd_ybggsTa21Og4XGAPUIA.text: About a year ago this place had really good reviews, seems like it's gone way down since then. It's hard to keep up with all the competition on the Strip. Hubs and I headed here for a quick bite before our show. We should've turned around when we saw this place was pretty empty.   Just a regular old burger joint. They also offer chicken and turkey burgers.   Overpriced average food. Never again. Avoid please.   The decor is outdated. You need to ask for a key to use their bathrooms.   We ate as quickly as we could to gtfo.

nQeOfftJAbevsOwSVF4l5g.text: Sat outside enjoyed the view of the strip. Burger was great with fat fries. Service was quick and very friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Uk1MgAmPy2cHfahZQ3LFRg.text: Great location, hours, juicy burgers, great customer service. It's a simple burger spot, don't expect anything else. I got the XXXL burger "challenge" and it was tasty and filling.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. XXXL with cheese and sweet potato fries. Perfect cheat meal.

D0fA61k1vKU0rkEA7lB6AQ.text: This place is right across the street from the Monte Carlo.    Pretty decent burger.  The have 4 sizes to choose from and four add-ins (cheese, bacon, chili, and an egge). I opted for everything but the chili and I was quite happy.  This burger is a step up from In-N-Out but still not as good as a Royal Robin Burger.    The fries come in two cuts skinny or steak fries.  Nothing too special here. The onion rings were ok.    The Maui-banana shake is very good.  3.5 stars  In n out being 2.5 stars.

SLph6Lir83pwxsGA1yFgNw.text: It's a fast food place.. The burgers are good the bread was hard it reminds of Johnny Rockets. The sweet potato fries were soggy.  the serve you the food knowing the cheese didn't melt on either the fries and burger who does that??? had to change my order the large burger with sweet potato fries. Not a fan of cold food

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qVF_en3eqJ-9tjW0iMFnfA.text: "I'm fly at Fat Burger when I'm way out west" - Beastie Boys  And this spot on the Strip is the best.  It has a huge outdoor patio with a bar and tv's.  No other Fatburger that I've been to does it like this.  Fatburger isn't my favorite, but it is pretty good.  There is an indoor part of this Fatburger, but what's the point of that?  But really, everything tastes better outside, with a beer, and watching a game.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. $2 green PBR! They&#39;re trying to get rid of their kegs left over from St. Party&#39;s Day. No better deal this end of the strip!

C0SYixOPRfI5vVZ5DQxC3A.text: I've been having a Vegas affair with Fatburger ever since I've been going out to the strip.    Located just south of the center of the strip, this 24hr burger joint brings the flavor.  They offer burgers, chicken, turkey, and veggie burgers so they are sure to please any crowd (drunk or sober).  They have killer steak fries and their add-ons (egg, cheese, etc) make the possibilities endless.  Plenty of indoor and outdoor seating as well as full bar options just add on the awesomeness of this place.    Long story short, when you're needing drunk munchies food on the strip, this place delivers.(not like actual delivery to your room/location, but more a metaphorical delivery).  Boosh.

vLIChPVEiWXQVkRGn6qtRw.text: I think Fatburger has a really good burger. It's a hand-formed patty and it's cooked after you order it. It's hard to find that in fast-food nowadays.  The topping are always good and fresh. I really like that they put both sweet relish AND dill pickles on their burgers. It's unique and it tastes good.  The steak fries are also good. Hard to find at a fast food place nowadays.   I always make sure to get Fatburger in at least once while I'm in Vegas.

Bo1AZpC_t9rbDeJ0sYenmQ.text: I ordered from this place and I have never been so disappointed, ordered 3 items and only got 1 out of the 3.. on top of that the one item was wrong and didn't come with what it said it did. When I called I was hung up on twice and when I was able to talk to someone they were extremely rude and unprofessional. I will never order from this place again.

VW24UGnlDziIdwdI6qyzlw.text: For strip fast food, it was actually really really good. Thank god for the 32oz beer option as well.

igXZcSXFey2NrKUWYm1jOg.text: Best Burger in town! They are a must while staying on the strip in Las Vegas. Everything is made to order. You can add what ever toppings you want. They have a small sitting area outside and in. You can enjoy a burger and people watch! What better to do in Las Vegas.

oS4L-EuwiYn_U8UCcK_2sg.text: Ate here twice while in town and each time my burger was over cooked ,  it was tough. I only ordered a second time cuz the first fries were big and nice edible, good my second order not so much even the fries were over cooked. Not worth $35-$45 dollars for two people each time with and without drinks I'll pass, they were  crowded they rushed but gave awful food. Check your food before you leave each time was carry out. I'm used to fatburgers LA where there not only fat but juicy not dried out and hard.

FbJ2QHHXqdxKDEqtUxRHhw.text: I got the 1lb Burger, with egg and cheese. A wonderful Burger, I couldn't finish it and had enough left over for another meal.i didn't find their fries to be nearly as good.

is1GdhK4pMYDAI5dGlGMiw.text: Nothing special. The beef is packed on just like a fat patty should be. I think, I enjoyed the skinny ass chili cheese fries a lot more.    First time for everything!

bgxqDNkAu9TLT7zGVbUO0w.text: I actually went out of my way down the strip a bit to get a veggie burger! The place was clean and the service was fine. I loved my veggie burger! It's a Boca patty and when topped with all the veggies and cheese, it's soooo good. I WILL be back next time I'm in Vegas.  Plus...COKE ZERO!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

cFEbbQt1TiCov32pB0g1RA.text: So I've never had Fatburger and having it for the first time in Vegas was nice. Even though the place was filled, the food came in a timely manner. I got the original burger with cheese and Sophia got the veggie burger.   Quality of the burger was great. Meaty, had a chat and just tasted like a great burger. I was glad the smallest option had me satisfied. Since this one is on the strip, you could expect to pay a little more than you're used to if you've eaten off the strip. That being said, the burger and onion rings was about $15 but it was delicious. I like how they make it with mayo & mustard and no ketchup. That's how I like my burgers everywhere but if you want ketchup, there's a bottle on every table.  Since this is yelp, I know you're looking for a fair review so I'll talk about something's that we're so great. The bun was a bit toasted too much or maybe it was out of the bag for a while because pieces were falling off when I'm not used to that while eating a burger. Other than that, nothing really bugged me.   Even though this wasn't a perfect burger, I give it 5 stars because I enjoyed it, the fries were like McDonald's aka the best fries in the world and the service was great.   My favorite burger place is still in-n-out but if you're looking to try something different from that and shake shack, Fatburger will do the job. I'll definitely come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie burger  Skinny Fries
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Original Burger (smallest option)  1/3 lb with no relish Onion rings

f43FwHwS0UVSrVcyBaa3-w.text: The service was ok.  They messed up my friend's order and brought out a veggie burger. So I had to eat my food before there's came out. Then I had to watched them eat The fries tasted as tho they were reheated, very stale and hard.  If u ask me; overpriced and not worth the hype.

VhFvs4I5nJS0JxsLXp-beQ.text: Not my favorite burger in Vegas.    The experience wasn't bad really. I thought the staff were friendly and motivated. The restaurant was clean.   But the burger itself fell short of my expectations. For $20, I understandably expected more. Sure, the burger was huge and impressive in size, but the patty was dry and lacked flavor. I would return for the onion rings, though.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fat burger &amp; onion rings
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Logo

fvmynJeTlqY--YAHKaVGdQ.text: Growing up in the '90s, I've always loved Fatburger because of Ice Cube's "It Was A Good Day".  So since there aren't any Fatburger restaurants where I live, I try to stop in when I see one just for old time's sake!  Service was very friendly here, when the cashier found out my friend and I were splitting the burger, he offered to have it halved for us.  Burger was solid and I love the thick steak fries!    Good place to come, at 2am like Ice Cube or at any other time you're hungry!

fkIYwiOoTJTUxmKrhWZ77Q.text: Thank you, Fatburger, for being open at 3AM and for having gluten free buns. That's the whole review. Bless you.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gluten free cheese burger.

M9SxZl45iUcH_wnNGvqJCg.text: OMG what an amazing burger and fries experience.  I dined here after initially arriving in LV for the first time. I got settled into my hotel and then sought this place out s it was recommended I go here while in LV. I got a margarita and a cheeseburger with fries. The burger was omg delicious and the steak fries were perfect if you like your fries thick. It's definitely a place you have to visit while in LV and their outdoor seating and bar area is awesome. Don't walk by make sure to stop!  Best burger in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Tmeechfkp0zCeudbz5cBFg.text: If you're a fan of Ice Cube's hit song "Today Was A Good Day", the verse "2 in the morning got the Fat Burger" can really be True if you're on the Vegas Strip at 2a.m. & happen to walk past this popular West Coast burger franchise!  As far as burger quality goes, Fat Burger is on par with the likes of Five Guys but not quite like In-N-Out. Everything is fresh, made-to-order, & a perfect solution to soak up all the drinks consumed at all the clubs, casinos, bars, & other nightlife The Strip has to offer!  So if you're in Vegas late at night & the Denny's is packed to the gills, get your late night eat on at Fat Burger instead!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

if6ndiFohvtsF0eaXLShgA.text: The service was awesome and the environment was great. My family loved their burgers, but mine wasn't good.   I asked for my cheeseburger without the bun, which can be dicey for the stuff you add on your burger, but I'm not sure what happened to my burger. It was really overdone on the outside, and didn't have almost any flavor. It was also small and misshapen. Not like a handmade patty, but one carelessly done.   My family loved theirs, though. And our waitress was great. Kept our beverages filled and was fun to talk to. We sat outside and the heaters were on to keep everyone warm. The music was also super fun. I would come to have a drink at the outside bar for sure, but wouldn't order another burger.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

haXktSpJByDsyx5Y2CA6ww.text: Came here to specifically try the impossible burger. What you get is very different than all the pictures they show - looks like a fat juicy burger in their ads, but what I got was more like a disc that was flattened as far as it would go and cooked to death. Was so dry it almost crumbled apart. I could tell it might be good if prepared properly, but they are not the ones to do it. Will look elsewhere to try again.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Impossible Burger
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Impossible burger

1eGVlc_6HOzFiEDT7PQQCg.text: Ice Cube, you'll be happy to know that your joint is still just as good, whether today was a good day or bad one. This Fatburger location comes with one big secret - you'll snag a faster burger and great meal on The Strip here than almost any place else during the day. Plus, free fries with a beer purchase. What's not to like? Slap a load of bacon or a fried egg into your towering large burger, and the party in your mouth will be rocking. Just keep in mind that they're a relish and mustard joint, so don't expect ketchup or an In-n-Out spread in this. I actually think it's a better combo regardless.

r7lY9YGBhjLRgdDGSfln3g.text: I've never really had FatBurger before. Only people from the west coast or lyrics from rap songs do I hear the name. But since I was in the area, I thought we'd give it a shot.  I walk up to the guy taking the order. It was my first time so, he explained how it went. So I did the original with the egg, fries and a drink. Everything was a-la-carte so buy what you need.  The skinny fries are really good, its almost as if I've finally found the only one that can hold a candle to Mcdonalds fries. I'm probably going to get crap for that, this is IMO. The burger is pretty good. Definitely well seasoned, the egg was over done which was kind of a downer. I would've loved to do the egg porn shot, but the yolk was super dry. No oozing liquid isn't very exciting to see.  I'd definitely eat here again. My dining experience was really good and enjoyed every minute of it.  Thank you so much for reading my review. I hope this helps with your decision making experience. Enjoy your awesome yelptastic day!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. (&#34;,)
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. (&#34;,)
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. (&#34;,)

PTBe3eQsbOjVfaV6odGGfg.text: What can I say about drunken food dives at 3 o'clock in the morning! Get your drink AND eat on after hours! Such a beautiful and calm time in Vegas, no crazy crowds, no rush....just peace, burgers and beers! What more can you ask for?!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon egg and cheese burger
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sliders
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DQIH48fUYkYUKzrJeYJBEw.text: We came here at 4:30 AM on a Saturday morning and enjoyed the chicken sandwiches. They're not unreasonably priced and are one of few options late at night.

Ue8NMKbfeKoLIp1nkJP2fw.text: I'm giving it a 3 star because I ordered the Franks Red Hot Chicken Sandwich and it barley had any sauce on it. I was expecting more; however, the sand which was very tasty. It hit the spot. Some of the lettuce was a little wilted. I did delivery, the restaurant is around 7 mins from where I was located. I LOVE the way they sealed the bag. That was very important.  Overall, a great experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PJ3MqerUB3h1RMavJ3uAXw.text: If i didn't have to put 1 star i wouldn't have this bs is gross i paid 9 almost 10 bucks for this dry burger and the bread was hard my fries are cold and hard my husbands burger was sloppy never again DONT STOP HERE...

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nQ9eg7T322pLjYUg_9OC5Q.text: The kids wanted burgers and shakes all week long. Luckily, Vegas has a plethora of burgers. The only reason we stopped here for lunch was because of the donut that looked like a turd. The girls just had to have it.   The burgers were really good here with fresh toppings. There's a little wait while the burgers are cooked to order, but nothing too terrible. I also ordered a beer which came with free fries, both tasted so good on a hot August day. The girls had three different flavored milkshakes that were super thick and cold.   Back to the donut turd, it tasted like it looks. The shittiest donut. The kids wouldn't even eat it after just one bite.

-5ZnuzWneNMnVN4IvG2_KQ.text: I came here at 8:28 pm Wednesday June 12th, the employees were kind about telling me they closed their grill 32 minutes before the posted closing time however it's not going to stop me from giving a 1 star review.

eFBcsLBoBDVgp3JMvox8FQ.text: We had to stop here while in Vegas because of Ice Cube's "Today Was A Good Day." Lol We got there around 4 pm and there was only a few people in there. We were able to order right away, and easily found a booth and waited for our food to come out. You can watch everything being cooked to order, which I think makes it different (and better) than other fast food joints. We both ordered a burger and we shared fries. We were able to choose "skinny" or "fat" fries. The cashier recommended the fat fries and they did not disappoint. The burgers were big, juicy, and flavorful. The fries came out hot and crispy. I really liked everything about Fatburger. I wish we had one on the East Coast!

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummmy!!!   The Original Fatburger and  Fat (Steak) Fries in the background!

A1r-nrAyQc2Dfbl-_-xFkg.text: I've definitely had better... At this same restaurant. Used to be a staple on our visits, but this last trip was very disappointing. Almost as if it got too big. Meat didn't taste super fresh, my mum had the turkey burger and was sure it was frozen. Everything was just Meh. Such a shame because we used to love it and recommended it to everyone who was going to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Fatburger - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_bxTKPL8U-hKbrO_Tj80FA.text: Great burger chain, I just hate this one particular restaurant that's on the strip.  Dirty on the outside and horribly crowded on the inside. You'll see all sorts of people in the inside from the business professional to the dirty street hookers. What's important is that they're actually pretty well behaved since they've all walked off the alcohol I guess. This place is crowded as hell and it will take you a while to get your food.  I ordered the king burger and a peanut butter shake and ate it all. The food was great but the waitline was just way way too long. We should have just gone through the drive through and then sat inside or something. (This technique works well at crowded In-N-Outs.)

G5moJZMQNqg3mwwpEnTjGA.text: Many people tell me they prefer In-N-Out over Fat Burger (or any other burger for that matter). To them I say, to each his own. Me? I prefer big juicy, greasy burgers, not small "clean" burgers. When I'm eating a burger, it's not supposed to be healthy or good for me. That's why a FATBURGER wins in terms of taste, size, and overall satisfaction. With a order of Fat Fries and a Large Coke. Yeah, now that's heaven. You can keep your overated, non-burger tasting in-n-out "burgers". Now, someone needs to bring a franchise to San Francisco.

NKWBd8aiq703D36WQFklHQ.text: A tad scary... (yes, I've seen women of the night at this establishment), and pretty expensive for burgers... but this place is a solid greasy option for your late night burger fix on the strip. I'm always glad these guys are around when I bust out of the poker table or craps game at 3 AM and want something yummy to eat.

al-WJqGKjHcN9nc1hI9usw.text: Delicious hamburgers! Stayed at the MGM and walked over here to get a good hamburger for a good price. I got the skinny fries & medium burger and it was simple and delicious. The BF got the chili cheese fries and said they were really good. Chili isn't my thing so I didn't try em. The service was good and fast and honestly I'm from California.. The Bay Area & I think this place is better then our In N Out.

95_WCVbT7LsfT-XRgnDUhQ.text: I love this place. You know why???  Because I love burgers.  You know why else???  Because you can throw in a fried egg in your burger.  People often think it's weird, but you can't knock it till you try it.  So try it.  The menu here is very simple with 6 burgers to choose from.  You got the 1/2 pound Kingburger to the Veggie Burger and 4 other options in between.  After choosing the burger of choice, you have your add-ons.  This includes bacon, an egg, chili, and cheese.  I like to add-on bacon, egg, and cheese.  I leave the chili for a different style of burger, where I'd add on chili and cheese.  As for the sides, I prefer skinny fries as opposed to fat fries (more crunchy and less starchy).  For the shakes, they have 3.  The basic chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry.  Choose whatever you feel like for that day... that's pretty much what I do.  Same goes for the soda.    But yeah, focus on the burger and enjoy.

akw0TPtH1Nr9rHN4D3hSJw.text: What better to start to whittle away a hangover like something called a King Burger at 4am?  Please note that this review was done after an all night drinking bender.   When you stroll into fat burger, its like visiting an old school hamburger place. All the food is cooked to order and they make no attempt to disguise what there selling you....from fat fries to a fat drink, you know that whatever you consume will have enough fat to kill a rhino.  But as with most things in life even though its terrible for you, its delicious. The wait time kind of sucks, but the wait is worth getting something that doesn't resemble a hockey puck a la McDonald's.  Its also a little on the expensive side with two meals running me about $27 bucks, which for a burger and fries is a little much.  Overall this place is OK, nothing too special though.

e2nkhnxq_5wldFLgN0RdLw.text: after a few days of dining in the casinos (buffets, restaurants, etc etc), it was a big sigh of relief to order a burger and fries. what can you expect from a fast food burger joint? it does do "made to order" style burgers...and it did get a bit backed up. me and my cousin had 2 orders and it took over 10 minutes, which was fine.   mixed crowd inside, and it was in a shady part of the stripe. lol. we did take out and walked back to our hotel while eating. pretty tasty!! i would say its better than In-and-Out burger down the road!

TzBnVzWYDV3mNSTAETFNVQ.text: Staff was friendly, burger was huge and fantastic. best burger I've had in a while.  Fat fries were piping hot. The only gripe was the Vegas prices but everything in Vegas is ridiculous. Don't hesitate get your burger here. Very casual diner feel.

YacIhLShfUGXXrNXe-1cpw.text: Wow what a great burger.  The place was dirty but it's on the strip in a rundown strip mall surrounded by drunk street urchins and strip-club card-slapping Mexicanos - what do you expect??  If it's 3am and you've been drinking on the strip all night and want to get amazing service, a J Crew-clad crowd, a sparkling clean facility, AND get a great burger at a great price for the strip, GO BACK TO YOUR HOTEL AND GO TO BED b/c you're an idiot.  Oh yeah the food.  Great burgers!  Got a few of the small burgers with cheese each time we went (thrice in three days).  The meat was juicy and not over-cooked, the tomato and onions and lettuce were all fresh and hadn't been sitting out.  Better than IN-N-Out in my opinion and way better than Wendys and way way way way better than McD's.

Cp5d-RKmYH94AjdL6U2Zkg.text: Very disappointing!  They were passing out 2 for 1 drink coupons on the street outside of this restaurant, so I decided to go in and have a burger and a couple of beers.  I ordered the half pound burger expecting a nice thick pub style patty. What I got was two thin burgers stacked on top of each other. That was my first mistake. The bill for my "buy one beer - get one free" was $7.00 (for a PBR). Total rip-off. There are lots of good places to eat on this part of the strip. Avoid Fatburger!

osm2ne8YplhUZPMtxv4uUQ.text: Now they have an open bar outside with waiting service. Big change with last year, changes inside too with the seating. Good thing is it's 24/7. I remember it tasted better years ago. Now it's just like any other place. First time eating since 2008.

keXXhSZEJsvKwOkUqjtFeA.text: I had dinner here with some friends last Friday.  Fatburger with cheese and egg: 5/5 - I don't know how it could be any better.
